objects.specification: A large rectangular floor with slightly textured concrete surface in a light grey shade, providing a stable foundation for the car fair booth. The material has a matte finish to reduce glare and ensure visitor safety while walking around.

A tall vertical wall segment forming the north boundary of the booth, with a smooth white finish. The wall is 4 meters high and 20 meters long, constructed with sturdy panels for a seamless look, providing privacy and backdrop.

A tall vertical wall segment forming the south boundary of the booth, with a smooth white finish. The wall is 4 meters high and 20 meters long, constructed with sturdy panels for a seamless look, providing privacy and backdrop.

A tall vertical wall segment forming the east boundary of the booth, with a smooth white finish. The wall is 4 meters high and 10 meters deep, constructed with sturdy panels for a seamless look, providing privacy and backdrop.

A tall vertical wall segment forming the west boundary of the booth, with a smooth white finish. The wall is 4 meters high and 10 meters deep, constructed with sturdy panels for a seamless look, providing privacy and backdrop.

A sleek modern demo car with aerodynamic body in metallic grey paint with subtle metallic flakes. The car features streamlined curves, tinted windows, detailed alloy rims, low-profile tires, and reflective surfaces highlighting its design under the exhibition lighting.

A modern reception desk with a glossy black finish, featuring clean straight lines, a raised countertop for visitor registration, integrated cable management, and a smooth laminate surface for branding displays.

An ergonomic staff chair with black faux-leather upholstery, padded seat and backrest, chrome base with caster wheels, adjustable height mechanism, and a sleek contemporary design suitable for reception staff.

An ergonomic staff chair with black faux-leather upholstery, padded seat and backrest, chrome base with caster wheels, adjustable height mechanism, and a sleek contemporary design suitable for reception staff.

A tall sleek display stand with a slender profile and minimalist design in red finish, featuring an integrated flat panel mount at eye level, a sturdy base, and subtle LED edge lighting to highlight promotional materials.

A tall sleek display stand with a slender profile and minimalist design in red finish, featuring an integrated flat panel mount at eye level, a sturdy base, and subtle LED edge lighting to highlight promotional materials.

A tall sleek display stand with a slender profile and minimalist design in red finish, featuring an integrated flat panel mount at eye level, a sturdy base, and subtle LED edge lighting to highlight promotional materials.
A small table with a matte black surface and solid column base, perfect for visitor discussions and refreshments. The table has a modern design with a slender pedestal.
A comfortable visitor chair with grey fabric seat and backrest, slender metal legs, and a simple contemporary style for casual seating.
A comfortable visitor chair with grey fabric seat and backrest, slender metal legs, and a simple contemporary style for casual seating.
